channel.title: Unknown problem? cant run client?
channel.description: ok so basically when i load a client from a downloaded source i got off this website its saying "client is already in use" on the batch file, which means its open somewhere else? even though ive looked through task manager and ended all batch files secondly used another compiler for the server source i chose which seems to be working fine now but my freind who took a look on teamviewer couldnt find exactly the problem but said somehow it could be to do with my port? ill try add more to this if i find more info. but please try and help as much as you can. also i just want a 317 for me to personally roam and code to gain some more coding experience. i followed soeones thread about portforwarding using torrent which i followed but im not sure if im portforwarded also if any1 works this out and cna port me forward can be considered pro because ive had a few people take alook at this. pm me on here, ask for my msn or vent if your willing to help or post.

item.title: Unknown problem? cant run client?
item.dc:creator: @mannyman mannyman
item.description:
@mannyman wrote:

alright ty, do that now.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2009, 10:45:01 am[/size][hr]so i restarted coomputer, i pen the client and its fine when i open the batchfile where it should say “server is online” ect… its says “server already in use” im just hoping someone on here has had this problem before and knows the resolutions.

Read full topic

item.description:

ok so basically when i load a client from a downloaded source i got off this website its saying “client is already in use” on the batch file,
which means its open somewhere else? even though ive looked through task manager and ended all batch files secondly used another compiler for the server source i chose which seems to be working fine now but my freind who took a look on teamviewer couldnt find exactly the problem but said somehow it could be to do with my port? ill try add more to this if i find more info. but please try and help as much as you can. also i just want a 317 for me to personally roam and code to gain some more coding experience. i followed soeones thread about portforwarding using torrent which i followed but im not sure if im portforwarded also if any1 works this out and cna port me forward can be considered pro because ive had a few people take alook at this. pm me on here, ask for my msn or vent if your willing to help or post.
